snippet: Embee, a longstanding Brooklyn manufacturer, makes the sunshades seen on food carts all over New York.
lead_paragraph: Embee, a longstanding Brooklyn manufacturer, makes the sunshades seen on food carts all over New York.

headline.seo: The City Reliquary Salutes the Embee Sunshade Company
headline.main: A New York Institution Steps Into the Sun
headline.print_headline: A New York Institution Steps Into the Sun
